title: 3 and Out - OC Patricia Problems, Lamar Leverage, FitzBroadcast, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - OC Patricia Problems, Lamar Leverage, FitzBroadcast, Mailbag
description:
John explains why a report that Matt Patricia could end up calling plays for the Patriots is a big problem, why Lamar Jackson has all the leverage in his negotiation with the Ravens, if Ryan Fitzpatrick has the broadcasting “it” factor. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Go to  FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
